verses.verse: And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage.<s%>
You shall have <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> me.

You shall not <S%H6213>make<s%> to you any <S%H6459>graven<s%> <S%H6754>image,<s%> or <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H8544>likeness<s%> of any thing that is in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H4605>above,<s%> or that is in the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8478>beneath,<s%> or that is in the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

You shall not <S%H7812>bow<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> yourself to them, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> them: for I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> am a <S%H7067>jealous<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H6485>visiting<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> on the <S%H1121>children<s%> to the <S%H8029>third<s%> and <S%H7256>fourth<s%> generation of them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me;
And <S%H6213>showing<s%> <S%H2617>mercy<s%> to <S%H505>thousands<s%> of them that <S%H157>love<s%> me, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>

You shall not <S%H5375>take<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H7723>vain;<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will not hold him <S%H5352>guiltless<s%> that <S%H5375>takes<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> in <S%H7723>vain.<s%>
<S%H2142>Remember<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> to <S%H6942>keep<s%> it <S%H6942>holy.<s%>
<S%H8337>Six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall you <S%H5647>labor,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4399>work:<s%>

But the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> is the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> in it you shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4399>work,<s%> you, nor your <S%H1121>son,<s%> nor your <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> your <S%H5650>manservant,<s%> nor your <S%H519>maidservant,<s%> nor your <S%H929>cattle,<s%> nor your <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that is within your <S%H8179>gates:<s%>

For in <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth,<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that in them is, and <S%H5117>rested<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> <S%H5921>why<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H6942>hallowed<s%> it.

<S%H3513>Honor<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%> and your <S%H517>mother:<s%> that your <S%H3117>days<s%> may be <S%H748>long<s%> on the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you.
You shall not <S%H7523>kill.<s%>
You shall not <S%H5003>commit<s%> <S%H5003>adultery.<s%>
You shall not <S%H1589>steal.<s%>
You shall not <S%H6030>bear<s%> <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> against your <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%>

You shall not <S%H2530>covet<s%> your <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> you shall not <S%H2530>covet<s%> your <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> nor his <S%H5650>manservant,<s%> nor his <S%H519>maidservant,<s%> nor his <S%H7794>ox,<s%> nor his <S%H2543>ass,<s%> nor <S%H3605>any<s%> thing that is your <S%H7453>neighbor's.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H6963>thunder,<s%> and the <S%H3940>lightning,<s%> and the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> and the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H6226>smoking:<s%> and when the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> it, they <S%H5128>removed,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H7350>afar<s%> off.

And they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H1696>Speak<s%> you with us, and we will <S%H8085>hear:<s%> but let not <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> with us, <S%H6435>lest<s%> we <S%H4191>die.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3372>Fear<s%> not: for <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H5254>prove<s%> you, and that his <S%H3374>fear<s%> may be <S%H5921>before<s%> your <S%H6440>faces,<s%> that you <S%H2398>sin<s%> not.

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H7350>afar<s%> off, and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> drew <S%H5066>near<s%> to the thick <S%H6205>darkness<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H430>God<s%> was.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> You have <S%H7200>seen<s%> that I have <S%H1696>talked<s%> with you from <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>
You shall not <S%H6213>make<s%> with me <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall you <S%H6213>make<s%> to you <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

An <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H127>earth<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> to me, and shall <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H5921>thereon<s%> your <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offerings, and your <S%H8002>peace<s%> offerings, your <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and your <S%H1241>oxen:<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4725>places<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> I <S%H2142>record<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> I will <S%H935>come<s%> to you, and I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> you.

And <S%H518>if<s%> you will <S%H6213>make<s%> me an <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H68>stone,<s%> you shall not <S%H1129>build<s%> it of <S%H1496>hewn<s%> stone: for if you <S%H5130>lift<s%> up your <S%H2719>tool<s%> on it, you have <S%H2490>polluted<s%> it.
<S%H3808>Neither<s%> shall you <S%H5927>go<s%> up by <S%H4609>steps<s%> to my <S%H4196>altar,<s%> that your <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> be not <S%H1540>discovered<s%> <S%H5921>thereon.<s%>
